resources.string:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<head>
    <meta charset="utf-8"/>
	<style>
.center-width,.restrict {
 max-width:1300px
}
.about,.main,.wrap {
 width:100%
}
.category,.flex__wrapper {
 -webkit-box-orient:vertical;
 -webkit-box-direction:normal
}
.connect__label,.dropdown__close {
 pointer-events:none;
 position:absolute
}
.donate__button,.donate__title {
 letter-spacing:1px;
 text-transform:uppercase
}
.about__p a,.blog-detail__back,.blog__excerpt,.blog__left-wrap,.blog__page,.blog__search-item,.category__button,.connect__link,.footer__connect,.footer__other-link,.footer__right-link {
 text-decoration:none
}
.donate__country,.select-style select {
 -webkit-appearance:none;
 -moz-appearance:none
}
.opaque {
 opacity:0!important
}
.node-clear:after,.node-clear:before {
 content:" ";
 display:table
}
.node-clear:after {
 clear:both
}
.pull--left {
 float:left!important
}
.pull--right {
 float:right!important
}
.hide {
 display:none!important
}
.full-wrap {
 display:block;
 float:left
}
.clear-margin {
 margin:0!important
}
.center-width {
 width:100%;
 margin:0 auto
}
.extra-padding {
 padding:20px
}
.flex__wrapper {
 display:-webkit-box;
 display:-ms-flexbox;
 display:flex;
 -ms-flex-direction:column;
 flex-direction:column
}
* {
 margin:0;
 padding:0;
 box-sizing:border-box;
 -webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased;
 font-weight:500;
 font-family:Roboto,sans-serif;
 color:#383535
}
.wrap {
 float:left;
 position:relative;
 overflow:hidden
}
.main {
 max-width:1440px;
 margin:0 auto
}
.about {
 float:left
}
.about:first-of-type {
 margin-top:20px
}
.about__emph {
 color:#2a2a2a
}
.about__headshot {
 width:480px;
 float:left;
 height:480px;
 -o-object-fit:cover;
 object-fit:cover;
 margin-top:48px
}
.about__headshot--right {
 float:right
}
@media screen and (max-width:991px) {
 .about__headshot {
  width:360px;
  height:360px
 }
}
@media screen and (max-width:767px) {
 .about__headshot {
  max-width:360px;
  width:100%;
  margin:0 auto 30px;
  display:block;
  float:none;
  height:auto
 }
}
.about__name,.about__p,.about__spec {
 margin-bottom:20px
}
.about__person-wrap {
 width:calc(100% - 480px);
 float:right;
 padding-left:80px;
 padding-right:40px
}
.about__person-wrap--left {
 float:left;
 padding-right:80px;
 padding-left:40px;
 text-align:right
}
@media screen and (max-width:991px) {
 .about__person-wrap {
  width:calc(100% - 360px)
 }
}
.about__linkedin {
 display:block;
 float:left
}
.about__linkedin--right {
 float:right
}
@media screen and (max-width:767px) {
 .about__person-wrap {
  width:100%;
  padding:0
 }
 .about__linkedin {
  float:none
 }
 .about__name {
  text-align:center
 }
}
.about__name {
 font-size:24px;
 float:left;
 width:100%;
 color:#383535
}
.about__p,.about__spec,.blog__excerpt {
 float:left;
 font-size:14px
}
.about__p {
 width:100%;
 line-height:1.7;
 color:#9b9b9b
}
.about__p a {
 color:#aecde1
}
.about__spec {
 width:100%;
 line-height:1.7;
 color:#9b9b9b
}
.about__wrap {
 width:100%;
 float:left;
 margin-bottom:80px
}
.blog {
 width:100%;
 float:left;
 margin-bottom:60px
}
.blog__bar {
 width:2px;
 height:100%;
 position:absolute;
 top:0;
 left:250px;
 background:linear-gradient(white,#000,#fff)
}
@media screen and (max-width:767px) {
 .blog__bar {
  display:none
 }
}
.blog__excerpt {
 width:calc(100% - 410px);
 line-height:2;
 color:#9b9b9b;
 padding:0 40px;
 display:block;
 max-height:160px;
 overflow:hidden
}
@media screen and (max-width:991px) {
 .blog__bar {
  left:200px
 }
 .blog__excerpt {
  width:calc(100% - 360px)
 }
}
@media screen and (max-width:767px) {
 .blog__excerpt {
  width:100%;
  padding:0
 }
}
.blog__image {
 width:160px;
 height:160px;
 -o-object-fit:cover;
 object-fit:cover;
 float:right;
 transition:.3s
}
@media screen and (max-width:767px) {
 .blog__image {
  height:250px;
  width:100%;
  margin-top:20px
 }
}
.blog__image:hover {
 opacity:.7
}
.blog__left-wrap {
 display:block;
 width:250px;
 float:left
}
@media screen and (max-width:991px) {
 .blog__left-wrap {
  width:200px
 }
}
@media screen and (max-width:767px) {
 .blog__left-wrap {
  width:100%
 }
}
.blog__page {
 color:#9b9b9b;
 transition:.3s
}
.blog__page:hover {
 color:#2a2a2a
}
.blog__page-prev {
 width:34%;
 display:block;
 float:left;
 padding:5px 0
}
@media screen and (max-width:767px) {
 .blog__page-prev {
  width:50%;
  text-align:left
 }
}
.blog__page-next {
 width:66%;
 display:block;
 float:left;
 text-align:center;
 padding:5px 0
}
@media screen and (max-width:767px) {
 .blog__page-next {
  width:50%;
  text-align:right
 }
}
.blog__sidebar {
 width:200px;
 float:right
}
.blog__search {
 float:right;
 padding:8px 40px;
 background:#2a2a2a;
 text-transform:uppercase;
 color:#fff;
 cursor:pointer;
 margin-bottom:10px;
 font-size:11px;
 font-weight:600;
 transition:.3s;
 border:1px solid #2a2a2a
}
.blog__search:hover {
 background:#fff;
 color:#2a2a2a
}
.blog__search-bar-wrap {
 width:100%;
 float:left;
 position:relative;
 margin-bottom:40px;
 overflow:hidden
}
.blog__search-input-hide {
 max-height:0;
 padding:0!important;
 border:none!important
}
.blog__search-input {
 width:100%;
 float:left;
 border:none;
 font-size:16px;
 color:#2a2a2a;
 padding:5px;
 outline:0;
 transition:.3s
}
.blog__search-item {
 width:100%;
 float:left;
 padding:10px 20px;
 display:block;
 color:#9b9b9b;
 transition:.3s;
 font-weight:600
}
.blog__search-item:hover {
 color:#2a2a2a
}
.blog__search-item-wrap {
 border:1px solid #2a2a2a;
 border-radius:3px;
 max-height:300px;
 width:100%;
 float:left;
 transition:.3s
}
.blog__submit {
 display:none
}
.blog__time {
 width:100%;
 float:left;
 color:#9b9b9b;
 font-size:12px;
 text-transform:uppercase
}
.blog__time b {
 font-weight:500
}
.blog__title {
 width:100%;
 font-size:24px;
 float:left;
 margin-bottom:10px;
 color:#2a2a2a;
 padding-right:10px;
 line-height:1.4
}
@media screen and (max-width:649px) {
 .blog__title {
  padding:0
 }
}
.blog__wrap {
 width:calc(100% - 200px);
 float:left;
 position:relative
}
@media screen and (max-width:991px) {
 .blog__wrap {
  width:100%
 }
}
.blog__x {
 display:block;
 position:absolute;
 top:9px;
 cursor:pointer;
 right:0;
 width:12px;
 height:12px;
 -o-object-fit:contain;
 object-fit:contain
}
.blog-detail__article {
 font-size:14px;
 color:#2a2a2a;
 line-height:2
}
.blog-detail__article h4 {
 font-weight:600;
 margin-bottom:20px
}
.blog-detail__article a {
 text-decoration:none;
 color:#aecde1
}
.blog-detail__article ul {
 padding-left:20px;
 list-style-type:none
}
.blog-detail__article p {
 margin-bottom:20px
}
.blog-detail__back {
 float:left;
 padding:0 20px;
 position:relative;
 color:#9b9b9b;
 display:block;
 font-size:16px;
 margin-bottom:30px;
 transition:.3s
}
.blog-detail__back:hover {
 color:#2a2a2a
}
.blog-detail__back-icon {
 display:block;
 width:10px;
 height:10px;
 position:absolute;
 left:0;
 top:5px
}
.blog-detail__content {
 width:60%;
 float:left;
 padding-right:60px
}
@media screen and (max-width:767px) {
 .blog-detail__content {
  width:100%;
  padding:0
 }
 .blog-detail__image {
  display:none
 }
}
.blog-detail__image {
 width:200px;
 float:right;
 height:auto;
 margin-bottom:30px
}
.blog-detail__image:nth-child(1) {
 width:100%
}
.blog-detail__side {
 width:40%;
 float:right
}
.blog-detail__swiper {
 display:none;
 width:100%;
 float:left;
 margin-bottom:30px!important
}
.blog-detail__time,.connect__input {
 margin-bottom:40px;
 width:100%;
 float:left
}
.blog-detail__time {
 color:#9b9b9b;
 font-size:14px
}
.blog-detail__time-mobile {
 display:block
}
@media screen and (max-width:767px) {
 .blog-detail__side {
  width:100%
 }
 .blog-detail__swiper {
  display:block
 }
 .blog-detail__time-mobile {
  display:none
 }
}
.blog-detail__time-main {
 display:none
}
.blog-detail__title {
 width:100%;
 float:left;
 font-size:60px;
 font-weight:500
}
@media screen and (max-width:767px) {
 .blog-detail__time-main {
  display:block
 }
 .blog-detail__title {
  font-size:40px
 }
}
.connect__input {
 color:#383535;
 padding:5px;
 font-size:13px;
 border:none;
 border-bottom:1px solid #9b9b9b;
 outline:0
}
.connect__input-wrap {
 position:relative;
 width:100%;
 float:left
}
.connect__command {
 width:100%;
 float:left;
 font-family:monospace;
 margin-bottom:30px
}
.connect__label {
 font-size:14px;
 top:5px;
 left:5px;
 color:#9b9b9b;
 transition:.3s
}
.connect__label--focused {
 font-size:10px;
 top:-10px
}
.connect__paragraph,.connect__server {
 width:100%;
 font-size:16px;
 line-height:1.8;
 float:left
}
.connect__link {
 color:#aecde1
}
.connect__paragraph {
 margin-bottom:30px;
 color:#2a2a2a
}
.connect__server {
 margin-bottom:10px;
 color:#2a2a2a
}
.connect__form-section {
 width:40%;
 float:left;
 padding-right:80px
}
@media screen and (max-width:991px) {
 .connect__form-section {
  width:100%!important;
  border:none;
  padding:0;
  margin-bottom:30px
 }
}
.connect__section {
 width:60%;
 border-left:2px solid #2a2a2a;
 padding-left:80px;
 float:left;
 padding-right:0
}
.connect__section ul {
 padding-left:20px;
 list-style:none;
 margin-bottom:20px;
 width:100%;
 float:left
}
.connect__section ul li {
 font-weight:400;
 font-family:monospace
}
@media screen and (max-width:991px) {
 .connect__section {
  width:100%!important;
  border:none;
  padding:0;
  margin-bottom:30px
 }
}
.connect__success {
 float:left;
 width:100%;
 color:#2a2a2a;
 margin-top:10px
}
.connect__submit {
 float:left;
 padding:8px 17px;
 border:1px solid #9b9b9b;
 color:#9b9b9b;
 border-radius:2px;
 text-transform:uppercase;
 transition:.3s;
 font-size:12px;
 cursor:pointer
}
.connect__submit:hover {
 color:#fff;
 background:#9b9b9b
}
.connect__table {
 width:100%;
 float:left;
 font-size:14px;
 margin-bottom:20px;
 line-height:1.8
}
.connect__table--head {
 border-bottom:1px solid #383535
}
.connect__title {
 width:100%;
 float:left;
 color:#2a2a2a;
 margin-bottom:25px;
 font-size:28px
}
.connect__ul {
 list-style:none;
 margin-bottom:30px;
 color:#2a2a2a;
 line-height:1.8;
 font-size:12px
}
.coord--pdx01 {
 left:calc(7.5% - 15px);
 top:calc(27% - 15px)
}
.coord--sjc01 {
 left:calc(7.5% - 15px);
 top:calc(34% - 15px)
}
.coord--slc01 {
 left:calc(11% - 15px);
 top:calc(30% - 15px)
}
.coord--ord2 {
 left:calc(19% - 15px);
 top:calc(29% - 15px)
}
.coord--iad01 {
 left:calc(21% - 15px);
 top:calc(30% - 15px)
}
.coord--yul01 {
 left:calc(24% - 15px);
 top:calc(24% - 15px)
}
.coord--gru01 {
 left:calc(28% - 15px);
 top:calc(77% - 15px)
}
.coord--dub01 {
 left:calc(42% - 15px);
 top:calc(20% - 15px)
}
.coord--fra01 {
 left:calc(46.2% - 15px);
 top:calc(23% - 15px)
}
.coord--bom01 {
 left:calc(67.5% - 15px);
 top:calc(43.5% - 15px)
}
.coord--bir01 {
 left:calc(69.5% - 15px);
 top:calc(49.5% - 15px)
}
.coord--sin01 {
 left:calc(78% - 15px);
 top:calc(56% - 15px)
}
.coord--hnd01 {
 left:calc(87% - 15px);
 top:calc(33% - 15px)
}
.coord--syd01 {
 left:calc(91% - 15px);
 top:calc(83% - 15px)
}
.coord--lag01 {
 left:calc(45% - 15px);
 top:calc(54% - 15px)
}
.coord--san01 {
 left:calc(7% - 15px);
 top:calc(30% - 15px)
}
.category {
 width:25%;
 float:left;
 padding:20px;
 display:-webkit-box;
 display:-ms-flexbox;
 display:flex;
 -ms-flex-direction:column;
 flex-direction:column;
 -webkit-box-align:center;
 -ms-flex-align:center;
 align-items:center
}
.category__button {
 padding:10px 20px;
 border:1px solid #9b9b9b;
 border-radius:2px;
 color:#9b9b9b;
 margin:0 auto;
 display:block;
 font-size:14px;
 font-weight:600;
 text-transform:uppercase;
 transition:.3s
}
.category__button:hover {
 background:#9b9b9b;
 color:#fff
}
.category__image {
 width:100%;
 height:240px;
 -o-object-fit:contain;
 object-fit:contain;
 float:left;
 display:block
}
.category__title {
 width:100%;
 float:left;
 font-size:24px;
 height:56px;
 overflow:hidden;
 margin-top:30px;
 margin-bottom:40px;
 color:#2a2a2a;
 text-align:center
}
@media screen and (max-width:991px) {
 .category {
  width:50%
 }
}
@media screen and (max-width:767px) {
 .category {
  width:100%
 }
}
.dropdown {
 width:100%;
 float:left;
 max-height:0;
 overflow:scroll;
 transition:.3s;
 background:#fff;
 position:absolute;
 top:40px;
 z-index:300
}
.dropdown__arrow {
 width:11px!important
}
.dropdown__close {
 top:10px;
 right:0;
 width:15px;
 height:15px
}
.dropdown__close-left,.dropdown__close-right {
 width:19px;
 position:absolute;
 top:3px;
 height:2px;
 background:#000;
 transition:.3s
}
.dropdown__close-right {
 right:0;
 -webkit-transform:rotateZ(-45deg);
 transform:rotateZ(-45deg);
 -webkit-transform-origin:80% 0;
 transform-origin:80% 0
}
.dropdown__close-left {
 left:0;
 -webkit-transform:rotateZ(45deg);
 transform:rotateZ(45deg);
 -webkit-transform-origin:20% 40%;
 transform-origin:20% 40%
}
.donate,.donate__info,.dropdown__wrap {
 width:100%;
 position:relative;
 float:left
}
.dropdown__input {
 font-size:24px;
 width:100%;
 float:left;
 border:none;
 border-bottom:1px solid #9b9b9b;
 padding:5px 20px 5px 5px;
 cursor:pointer
}
.dropdown__item {
 width:100%;
 float:left;
 font-size:24px;
 padding:10px;
 cursor:pointer
}
.dropdown__item:hover {
 border-bottom:1px solid #9b9b9b
}
.dropdown__show {
 max-height:300px
}
.donate {
 max-width:700px
}
.donate__info {
 font-size:20px;
 color:#2a2a2a;
 margin-bottom:24px;
 border-bottom:1px solid transparent;
 min-height:61px
}
.donate__half {
 width:50%;
 float:left;
 padding-right:40px
}
@media screen and (max-width:649px) {
 .donate__half {
  width:100%;
  padding:none
 }
}
.donate__quarter {
 width:25%;
 float:left;
 padding-right:40px
}
@media screen and (max-width:900px) {
 .donate__quarter {
  width:100%;
  padding-right:40px
 }
}
.donate__quarter--small {
 padding-right:15px
}
@media screen and (max-width:900px) {
 .donate__quarter--small {
  padding-right:40px
 }
}
.donate__title {
 width:100%;
 float:left;
 color:#504B4B;
 font-size:10px;
 font-weight:600;
 margin-bottom:24px
}
.donate__button {
 display:block;
 padding:6px 0;
 text-align:center;
 border-radius:2px;
 color:#9b9b9b;
 border:1px solid #9b9b9b;
 width:100px;
 font-size:9px;
 cursor:pointer
}
.donate__button:first-of-type {
 margin-right:15px
}
.donate__button__wrapper {
 display:-webkit-box;
 display:-ms-flexbox;
 display:flex
}
.donate__button--active {
 background-color:#5A97C0;
 color:#fff;
 border:1px solid #5A97C0
}
.donate__button--submit {
 background-color:#312E2F;
 color:#fff;
 border:1px solid #312E2F;
 float:left;
 width:150px;
 padding:11px 10px;
 font-size:12px
}
.donate__cash,.donate__input {
 font-size:20px;
 color:#5A97C0
}
.donate__input {
 display:none;
 border:0;
 width:150px;
 height:34px;
 outline:0;
 padding:0 0 0 23px;
 margin:0
}
.donate__cash {
 position:absolute;
 top:6px;
 left:121.5px
}
.donate__underline {
 position:absolute;
 background-color:#9b9b9b;
 width:144.94px;
 height:1px;
 top:29px;
 left:110px
}
.donate__width {
 width:50%;
 float:left;
 padding-right:40px;
 margin-bottom:24px
}
@media screen and (max-width:649px) {
 .donate__width {
  width:100%;
  max-width:594px
 }
}
.donate__country {
 display:block;
 border:0;
 border-bottom:1px solid #9b9b9b;
 width:100%;
 max-width:310px;
 color:#9b9b9b;
 font-size:13px;
 padding-bottom:5px;
 background-color:transparent;
 border-radius:0
}
@media screen and (max-width:649px) {
 .donate__country {
  width:100%;
  max-width:inherit
 }
}
.donate__country--bar {
 position:absolute;
 bottom:50%;
 left:0;
 right:0;
 height:1px;
 background-color:#9b9b9b
}
.donate__error {
 position:absolute;
 left:0;
 top:35px;
 color:red;
 font-size:12px
}
#error-message {
 position:absolute;
 bottom:35px;
 left:0
}
#donation-processing {
 position:absolute;
 bottom:9px;
 left:165px
}
.header,.relative {
 position:relative
}
.relative {
 float:left
}
.arrow-bg {
 background-image:url(../images/arrow-down.png);
 background-repeat:no-repeat;
 background-size:20px;
 background-position:85% 10%
}
.green {
 color:green
}
.red {
 color:red
}
.footer {
 width:100%;
 float:left;
 background:#2a2a2a
}
.footer__connect {
 border:1px solid #9b9b9b;
 border-radius:2px;
 margin-right:10px;
 display:block;
 float:right;
 font-size:12px;
 font-weight:600;
 padding:8px 15px;
 text-transform:uppercase;
 color:#9b9b9b;
 transition:.3s
}
.footer__connect:hover {
 background:#9b9b9b;
 color:#fff
}
@media screen and (max-width:767px) {
 .footer__connect {
  float:left;
  margin-left:10px
 }
}
.footer__linkedin {
 width:32px;
 height:auto;
 display:block;
 float:right;
 margin-bottom:30px
}
@media screen and (max-width:767px) {
 .footer__linkedin {
  float:left
 }
}
.footer__other-link {
 display:inline-table;
 margin-bottom:10px;
 font-size:12px;
 color:#9b9b9b
}
.footer__right,.footer__sites {
 display:-webkit-box;
 display:-ms-flexbox;
 -ms-flex-direction:column;
 -webkit-box-orient:vertical;
 -webkit-box-direction:normal
}
.footer__other-title {
 width:100%;
 float:left;
 margin-bottom:30px;
 color:#dbdbdb;
 font-size:14px
}
.footer__right {
 width:calc(100% - 200px);
 float:right;
 display:flex;
 flex-direction:column;
 -webkit-box-align:end;
 -ms-flex-align:end;
 align-items:flex-end
}
.footer__right-link {
 color:#9b9b9b;
 display:block;
 text-align:right;
 margin-bottom:10px;
 font-size:12px
}
@media screen and (max-width:767px) {
 .footer__right {
  width:100%;
  margin-top:10px;
  -webkit-box-align:start;
  -ms-flex-align:start;
  align-items:flex-start
 }
 .footer__right-link {
  text-align:left
 }
}
.footer__sites {
 width:200px;
 float:left;
 display:flex;
 flex-direction:column
}
@media screen and (max-width:767px) {
 .footer__sites {
  width:100%;
  text-align:left
 }
}

.header {
 width:100%;
 float:left;
 padding:33px 56px
}

}

  padding:8px 17px!important;

 }
}
.header__connect:hover {

}

 font-size:12px;
 color:#9b9b9b;
 text-decoration:none;
 transition:.3s;
 text-align:right;
 text-transform:uppercase
}
.header__wrapper {
 display:-webkit-box;
 display:-ms-flexbox;
 display:flex;
 -webkit-box-orient:vertical;
 -webkit-box-direction:normal;
 -ms-flex-direction:column;
 flex-direction:column;
 -webkit-box-pack:start;
 -ms-flex-pack:start;
 justify-content:flex-start;

}

}

}

}

 position:absolute
}

 cursor:pointer
}
.header__mobile-icon {

}

  display:block

}

}

}

}

 -o-object-fit:cover;

 margin-bottom:40px;
 float:right;

}
@media screen and (max-width:991px) {

 }
}

  width:100%;

 }
}
.home__info,.home__item {
 padding-bottom:10px;
 font-size:13px;
 float:left
}
.home__frame {
 width:100%;
 float:left;
 height:650px;
 border:none
}
.home__info {
 color:#9b9b9b;
 padding-right:5px
}
.home__location {
 width:30px;
 height:30px;
 border-radius:15px;
 position:absolute;
 transition:.3s;
 border:1px solid transparent;
 cursor:pointer
}
.home__location.active {
 -webkit-animation:signal 1.5s infinite linear;
 animation:signal 1.5s infinite linear
}
.home__location.slow-active {
 -webkit-animation:signalSmall 1.5s infinite linear;
 animation:signalSmall 1.5s infinite linear
}
.home__location--multiple {
 width:50px;
 height:50px;
 border-radius:25px;
 border:1px solid transparent
}
.home__location--multiple.active {
 -webkit-animation:signalLarge 1.5s infinite linear;
 animation:signalLarge 1.5s infinite linear
}
.home__location--outer {
 width:40px;
 border-radius:20px;
 height:40px;
 border:1px solid transparent
}
.home__location--outer.active {
 -webkit-animation:signalMed 1.5s infinite linear;
 animation:signalMed 1.5s infinite linear
}
.home__location-ball {
 width:8px;
 height:8px;
 border-radius:4px;
 position:absolute;
 left:calc(50% - 4px);
 top:calc(50% - 4px);
 background:rgba(56,53,53,.87);
 transition:.3s
}
.logo__hour,.logo__minute {
 transition:.8s ease-in-out
}
.home__location-ball.active {

}

}

}

}

 float:left;

}

}
.home__signal {
 width:40px;
 height:40px;
 position:absolute;
 left:0;
 top:0;
 border-radius:20px;
 border:1px solid #9b9b9b;
 -webkit-animation:signal 1.5s infinite linear;
 animation:signal 1.5s infinite linear
}
.home__signal-bar {
 width:2px;
 height:120px;
 bottom:0;
 position:absolute;
 left:calc(50% - 1px);
 background:linear-gradient(black,#fff)
}
.home__signal-ball {
 width:15px;
 height:15px;
 position:absolute;
 left:calc(50% - 7.5px);
 background:#000;
 border-radius:7.5px;
 top:12.5px
}
.logo__center,.logo__hour,.logo__hour-ball,.logo__minute,.logo__minute-ball {
 background:#595454
}
.home__signal-wrap {
 width:40px;
 height:140px;
 position:absolute;
 left:30%;
 top:-150px
}
.home__world,.logo {
 position:relative;
 float:left
}
.home__signal-flip {
 -webkit-transform:rotate(180deg);
 transform:rotate(180deg);
 top:auto;
 bottom:-150px
}
.home__spacer {
 float:left
}
.home__sub-title {
 width:100%;
 float:left;
 color:#9b9b9b;
 font-size:16px;
 line-height:1.5
}
.home__title {
 font-size:112px;
 float:left
}
.home__title--right {
 text-align:right
}
.home__world {

}

  font-size:60px

 }
}
.home__world-image {

}

  font-size:50px
 }
 .home__world {
  width:100%;
  padding:0
 }
 .home {
  margin-bottom:0;
  padding-bottom:30px
 }
}
@-webkit-keyframes signal {
 0%,100% {
  border:1px solid transparent
 }
 50% {
  border:1px solid #65A1C7
 }
}
@keyframes signal {
 0%,100% {
  border:1px solid transparent
 }
 50% {
  border:1px solid #65A1C7
 }
}
@-webkit-keyframes signalSmall {
 0%,100%,30%,70% {
  border:1px solid transparent
 }
 50% {
  border:1px solid #65A1C7
 }
}
@keyframes signalSmall {
 0%,100%,30%,70% {
  border:1px solid transparent
 }
 50% {
  border:1px solid #65A1C7
 }
}
@-webkit-keyframes signalMed {
 0%,40%,90% {
  border:1px solid transparent
 }
 60% {
  border:1px solid #65A1C7
 }
}
@keyframes signalMed {
 0%,40%,90% {
  border:1px solid transparent
 }
 60% {
  border:1px solid #65A1C7
 }
}
@-webkit-keyframes signalLarge {
 0%,100%,50% {
  border:1px solid transparent
 }
 70% {
  border:1px solid #65A1C7
 }
}
@keyframes signalLarge {
 0%,100%,50% {
  border:1px solid transparent
 }
 70% {
  border:1px solid #65A1C7
 }
}
.logo {
 width:52px;
 border:2px solid #595454;
 border-radius:26px;
 height:52px
}
.logo__center,.logo__hour,.logo__hour-ball,.logo__hour-orb,.logo__inner,.logo__minute {
 position:absolute
}
.logo__center {
 width:12px;
 height:12px;
 left:8px;
 top:8px;
 border-radius:6px
}
.logo__hour {
 width:2px;
 height:16px;
 top:-10px;
 left:5px;
 -webkit-transform:rotateZ(90deg);
 transform:rotateZ(90deg)
}
.logo__hour-move {
 -webkit-transform:rotateZ(120deg);
 transform:rotateZ(120deg)
}
.logo__hour-ball {
 width:6px;
 height:6px;
 border-radius:3px;
 left:2px;
 top:2px
}
.logo__hour-orb {
 width:14px;
 height:14px;
 border-radius:7px;
 left:-6px;
 top:-6px;
 border:2px solid #595454
}
.logo__inner {
 border:2px solid #595454;
 border-radius:16px;
 width:32px;
 height:32px;
 left:8px;
 top:8px
}
.logo__minute {
 width:2px;
 height:25px;
 top:-20px;
 left:5px;
 -webkit-transform:rotateZ(0);
 transform:rotateZ(0)
}
.report__bar-green,.report__bar-purple {
 transition:.3s ease-in;
 position:absolute;
 bottom:0
}
.logo__minute-move {
 -webkit-transform:rotateZ(360deg);
 transform:rotateZ(360deg)
}
.logo__minute-ball {
 width:8px;
 height:8px;
 border-radius:4px;
 left:-3px;
 position:absolute;
 top:-3px
}
.logo__rotate {
 -webkit-transform-origin:bottom;
 transform-origin:bottom
}
.logo__title {
 font-size:30px;
 color:#595454;
 padding:13.5px;
 font-weight:600;
 float:left
}
.logo__wrap {
 width:230px;
 float:left;
 display:-webkit-box;
 display:-ms-flexbox;
 display:flex;
 -webkit-box-align:center;
 -ms-flex-align:center;
 align-items:center
}
.report__bar-init {
 height:0!important
}
.report__bar-green {
 background:#6eae7d
}
.report__bar-purple {

 z-index:2
}
.report__curtain {
 width:100%;
 position:absolute;
 bottom:0;
 height:0;
 background:#fff;
 border:1px solid #9b9b9b;

}

 float:left;

}

}

}

 left:-130px;
 top:50%;

 -webkit-transform:rotateZ(-90deg);

}

 float:left
}
.report__row {

 position:relative;

}

}

.time {

}
.time__closed {

}

}

}

 font-weight:400;
 font-size:16px;
 min-width:150px;

 font-size:12px
}

}

}
.governance__text {

}

}

 max-width:600px
}

 -webkit-box-pack:justify;
 -ms-flex-pack:justify;
 justify-content:space-between
}
.flex-wrapper {
 display:-webkit-box;
 display:-ms-flexbox;
 display:flex
}
.sort__btn {
 border:1px solid #9b9b9b;
 padding:8px 17px;
 width:150px;
 text-align:center;
 margin-bottom:30px;
 transition:all .15s ease-in-out;
 cursor:pointer;
 -webkit-user-select:none;
 -moz-user-select:none;
 -ms-user-select:none;
 user-select:none
}
.sort__btn:hover {
 background-color:#9b9b9b;
 color:#fff
}
.select-style {
 overflow:hidden;
 border:0;
 border-bottom:1px solid #9b9b9b;
 background-color:transparent;
 background-image:url(../images/arrow-down.png);
 background-repeat:no-repeat;
 background-size:20px;
 background-position:100% 50%;
 margin-right:10px
}
.select-style select {
 padding:5px 8px;
 font-size:20px;
 color:#5A97C0;
 width:140px;
 border:none;
 box-shadow:none;
 background:0 0
}
.select-style select:focus {
 outline:0
}

</br>
    <div class="logo">
        <div class="logo__inner">
            <div class="logo__center">
                <div class="logo__minute logo__rotate">
                    <div class="logo__minute-ball"></div>
                </div>
                <div class="logo__hour logo__rotate">
                    <div class="logo__hour-orb">
                        <div class="logo__hour-ball"></div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

    <script src="https://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/3.3.1/jquery.min.js"></script>
    <script>
        window.onload = function() {
        $('.logo__minute').addClass('logo__minute-move');
        $('.logo__hour').addClass('logo__hour-move');
        }
    </script>
</body>
